name: Castle Conqueror - Revolution
description:
The Empire then arrived on the island and now control everything, and are seeking valuable resources and gold. They have ruined the island's environment and have hunted down and killed the tribal people; some of whom are your friends. You must now stop the Empire and protect your people by becoming a commander and leading your people against the evil Empire. This is a revolution for you and the entire island!

Features

• RTS/RPG elements with Advanced AI
• Set tactics for each battle/Multiple battles join-able during a war
• Allies are at the ready to battle your enemies
• Obtain coins to research new techniques that upgrade abilities
